meanings.definition: A system of tracks with trains for transporting goods or passengers.
meanings.sent1: The railways crisscrossed the country, connecting cities and towns.
meanings.sent2: I took the railways to visit my grandparents in the next town.
meanings.sent3: The railways were so busy that the trains had to do a little dance to avoid crashing into each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a complex network of railways, with thoughts traveling back and forth.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the railways rumbling in the distance filled the air with excitement.

meanings.definition: The company or organization that operates trains on a railway system.
meanings.sent1: The railways announced a new schedule for the upcoming month.
meanings.sent2: My uncle works for one of the railways as a train conductor.
meanings.sent3: The railways threw a party to celebrate reaching a new milestone in on-time arrivals.
meanings.sent4: She ran her household like a well-oiled railways, with everything running smoothly and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The railways' logo was proudly displayed on the side of every train, a symbol of reliability.
